com.tenkiv.tekdaqc.android.services

Class CommunicationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.tenkiv.tekdaqc.android.services.CommunicationService

  • public class CommunicationService
extends Service
    Android service for communicating with one or more Tekdaqcs. Handles connecting, disconnect, transmission of commands and receipt of messages/data.
    Since:
    v1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Jared Woolston (jwoolston@tenkiv.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CommunicationService.ServiceAction
      Actions which can be processed by the CommunicationService.
      private static class  CommunicationService.ServiceHandler
      Worker thread Handler for handling incoming DiscoveryService CommunicationService.ServiceAction requests.
